thread.title: Portal Instruments raises $25mm in Series B capital
thread.title_full: Portal Instruments raises $25mm in Series B capital

title: Portal Instruments raises $25mm in Series B capital
text:
Portal Instruments raises $25mm in Series B capital Deal Date: Oct-01-2015 / Deal # 201530767 Executive Summary 
Drug delivery device company Portal Instruments Inc. raised $25mm in a Series B preferred stock round led by 5AM Ventures. The company's existing investors including Sanofi-Sunrise also participated. $10mm was received up-front, with an additional $15mm expected following achievement of certain milestones. Proceeds will be used to further develop Portal's computerized needle-free drug delivery system for injectable biologics for chronic diseases. The technology is supported by an IP portfolio of over 50 patents conceived at Massachusetts Institute of Technology .
